reviewText:
This pig-shaped video is worth the money alone because it is so unique
for the pig lover! It shows amazing stunts in incredible places, and is fast edited.
The real pig person will love it, and be amazed from start to finish. It is for the collector or a person who wants something to cherish, and watch over and over. Nellie the pig is an extraordinary animal that any animal lover should see in action.
 This fast paced DVD will change your mind about the nature of pigs.
